channel.title: Help
channel.description: I have a problem where I can switch weapons(Such as dragon claws to a Chaotic Maul) And the claw spec hits 4 times like a chaotic maul.. This is obviously a big problem... does anyone know a fix? Or how to make it so players cant switch items in mid spec? or too fast? llike ive seen servers with the message "You can't switch that fast!" Help please? :|

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

I have a problem where I can switch weapons(Such as dragon claws to a Chaotic Maul) And the claw spec hits 4 times like a chaotic maul… This is obviously a big problem… does anyone know a fix? Or how to make it so players cant switch items in mid spec? or too fast? llike ive seen servers with the message “You can’t switch that fast!” Help please?
